lines.text: n , arr1 , arr2 , sum , sum1 = long long with arr1 , arr2 = array of size 1000 , sum = 0 , sum1 = 0
lines.code: long long n , arr1 [ 1000 ] , arr2 [ 1000 ] , sum = 0 , sum1 = 0 ;

lines.text: for i = 0 to n exclusive , read arr1 [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { cin >> arr1 [ i ] ; }

lines.text: for i = 0 to n exclusive , read arr2 [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { cin >> arr2 [ i ] ; }

lines.text: for i = 0 to n exclusive , sum = sum bitwise or arr1 [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { sum = sum | arr1 [ i ] ; }

lines.text: for i = 0 to n exclusive , sum1 = sum1 bitwise or arr2 [ i ]
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { sum1 = sum1 | arr2 [ i ] ; }
